experience: You and Andrea both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Amanda Vega, and 26 others

My day-to-day revolves largely around working closely with our team on brand development, creative copy, and increasing website conversions for our clients' marketing initiatives.I also develop internal strategies for the purpose of company growth and brand recognition. Tools for these strategies include social media, digital marketing, word of mouth, strategic partnerships, event planning and the occasional creative curve balls.
Custom Affiliate Websites | A Division of Liquis Design

Custom CrossFit Websites is a division Liquis Design created to help CrossFit affiliates use their website to increase membership and community while effectively expressing their brand. I have the privilege of working closely with a variety of affiliates to discover key elements that will make their website powerful as well as working with our in-house design team to bring these ideas to life.http://www.customcrossfitwebsites.com

As an independent practitioner, I provide PR and marketing services for local small businesses in addition to freelance work with other PR pros.   My experience in public relations and marketing extends to a diverse group of industries including style and beauty, fashion, outdoor recreation, entertainment, author and book, non-profit, information technology, banking, financial planning, real estate, residential building, association management, freight, construction and worksite safety.

In this position I secured prominent communications-oriented speakers for monthly professional development luncheons. I was responsible for event planning and evaluation analysis to increase the organizations member and non-member participation.

My work with Garcia Express truly encompassed the entire marketing realm. From branding to media relations and from internal and external communication to business planning, this job had it all. There was always something new on the horizon and the work was extremely rewarding.

When creating the publicity material for IABC Phoenix’s Copper Quill Awards banquet, I worked closely with Andy and her team at Liquis Design.  Liquis Design quickly created compelling postcard invitations, email blasts and other publicity material, leading to increased event participation.  It was more than just good design, but a comprehensive brand identity perfectly tying together the event’s theme and location.  In addition, Liquis Design excelled in client service – highly professional, responsive and results-oriented.  If you’re looking for great design and impressive client service, I recommend contacting Liquis Design.

Professional writer and editor
June 27, 2008, Geri worked with Andrea but at different companies

Andrea is a charming and detail-oriented professional who is a pleasure to work with. She met me at a Society of Journalists event, and instead of taking my card and blanketing me with dozens of pitches I'd never use (like many PR people do), she waited until she had the perfect story to pitch to me. I ended up selling the story to three local publications, getting a lot of publicity for the nonprofit group she represented. I was so impressed with my experience with her that I've recommended her to several PR firms for freelancing. I've had nothing but positive feedback on the quality of her work from those who have hired her.
